title: Anglo and Teck Investors Back Deal to Create $50 Billion Miner
description: Anglo American Plc and Teck Resources Ltd. shareholders voted in favor of the two companies combining, clearing a key step toward the creation of a $50 billion metals producer focused on copper mines in Chile and Peru.
content: Anglo American Plc and Teck Resources Ltd. shareholders voted in favor of the two companies combining, clearing a key step toward the creation of a $50 billion metals producer focused on copper mines in Chile and Peru.
